name: Say No to Rats
description:
What if rats tried to take your drinks?

Pick up Glasses and fill them up before the rats get them.

Maybe shoot them?

CONTROLS:

Press R to restart (The game is buggy, so you're gonna need it!!!)

- Escape to Quit
- Left Mouse button to pick up a Drink, Bottle or Gun.
- Right Mouse button to Drop Gun
- Mouse Scroll to turn Bottle

Credits:
- Dani (Progamming, Sound Editing, Art & Animation)
- Isak (Design & Environment art)
